field.name: USBVSTBY
field.description: USB voltage regulator in standby mode during VLPR or VLPW

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: USB voltage regulator not in standby during VLPR and VLPW modes

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: USB voltage regulator in standby during VLPR and VLPW modes

field.name: USBSSTBY
field.description: USB voltage regulator in standby mode during Stop, VLPS, LLS or VLLS

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: USB voltage regulator not in standby during Stop, VLPS, LLS and VLLS modes

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: USB voltage regulator in standby during Stop, VLPS, LLS and VLLS modes

field.name: URWE
field.description: USB voltage regulator enable write enable

field.name: UVSWE
field.description: USB voltage regulator VLP standby write enable

field.name: USSWE
field.description: USB voltage regulator stop standby write enable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: RTC 1 Hz clock drives RTC CLKOUT

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: RTC 32 kHz oscillator drives RTC CLKOUT

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: All off-chip accesses (op code and data) via the FlexBus are disallowed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: All off-chip accesses (op code and data) via the FlexBus are disallowed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Off-chip op code accesses are disallowed. Data accesses are allowed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Off-chip op code accesses and data accesses are allowed

field.name: PTD7PAD
field.description: PTD7 pad drive strength\n Controls the output drive strength of the PTD7 pin by selecting either one or two pads to drive it

field.name: USBSRC
field.description: USB clock source select\n Selects the clock source for the USB 48 MHz clock

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: MCGPLLCLK/MCGFLLCLK clock divided by the USB fractional divider. See the SIM_CLKDIV2[USBFRAC, USBDIV] descriptions

field.name: SDHCSRC
field.description: SDHC clock source select\n Selects the clock source for the SDHC clock

field.name: FTM1CH0SRC
field.description: FlexTimer 1 channel 0 input capture source select

field.name: FTM2CH0SRC
field.description: FlexTimer 2 channel 0 input capture source select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0 external clock driven by FTM CLKIN0 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0 external clock driven by FTM CLKIN1 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM1 external clock driven by FTM CLKIN0 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM1 external clock driven by FTM CLKIN1 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM2 external clock driven by FTM CLKIN0 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM2 external clock driven by FTM CLKIN1 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3 external clock driven by FTM CLKIN0 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3 external clock driven by FTM CLKIN1 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: CMP0 OUT drives FTM0 hardware trigger 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM1 channel match trigger drives FTM0 hardware trigger 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: PDB output trigger 1 drives FTM0 hardware trigger 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM2 channel match trigger drives FTM0 hardware trigger 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: CMP3 OUT drives FTM3 hardware trigger 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM1 channel match trigger drives FTM3 hardware trigger 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: PDB output trigger 3 drives FTM3 hardware trigger 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM2 channel match trigger drives FTM3 hardware trigger 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: UART0_TX pin modulated with FTM1 channel 0 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: UART0_TX pin modulated with FTM2 channel 0 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: UART1_TX pin modulated with FTM1 channel 0 Output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: UART1_TX pin modulated with FTM2 channel 0 Output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b010
enumeratedValue.description: K3x Family or K1x/K6x Family (with tamper)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b011
enumeratedValue.description: K4x Family or K2x Family (with tamper)

field.name: SERIESID
field.description: Kinetis Series ID: Specifies the Kinetis series of the device

field.name: I2C2
field.description: I2C2 Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the I2C2 module

field.name: USBFRAC
field.description: USB clock divider fraction\n This field sets the fraction multiply value for the fractional clock divider when the MCGFLLCLK/ MCGPLLCLK clock is the USB clock source (SOPT2[USBSRC] = 1).\n Divider output clock = Divider input clock*[(USBFRAC+1)/(USBDIV+1)]

field.name: USBDIV
field.description: USB clock divider divisor\n This field sets the divide value for the fractional clock divider when the MCGFLLCLK/MCGPLLCLK clock is the USB clock source (SOPT2[USBSRC] = 1).\n Divider output clock = Divider input clock*[(USBFRAC+1)/(USBDIV+1)]

field.name: PFLSH
field.description: Program flash\n For devices with FlexNVM, this bit is always clear.\n For devices without FlexNVM, this bit is always set

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Physical flash block 1 is used as FlexNVM - Reserved for devices without FlexNVM

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Physical flash block 1 is used as program flash

field.name: MAXADDR0
field.description: Max address block 0\n This field concatenated with 13 trailing zeros indicates the first invalid address of flash block 0 (program flash 0). For example, if MAXADDR0 = 0x20 the first invalid address of flash block 0 is 0x0004_0000. This would be the MAXADDR0 value for a device with 256 KB program flash in flash block 0

field.name: SWAPPFLSH
field.description: Swap program flash\n For devices without FlexNVM: Indicates that swap is active
